summary:
More than $4 billion has been invested in 2025 alone, with the XRING 01 being one of the highlights of developing core technology that will set the company apart from the competition

It was previously reported that, to make XRING 01 a reality, around 1,000 employees were hired, with the entire division being overseen by a former Qualcomm senior director who would directly report to Lei Jun. While the aforementioned figure might not have been dedicated entirely to the XRING 01, we can assume that a decent chunk has gone into its development. As reported by ITHome, the CEO’s speech mentioned that the efforts to launch the XRING 01 took a whopping 10 years.
